titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide a 1-year extension of the applicability of certain provisions in the programs for block grants regarding mental health and substance abuse, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 9/23/1994--Introduced. Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide a one year extension of the applicability to mental health and substance abuse block grant programs of specified provisions regarding transfers between allotments and minimum allotments for States.
